revenue_data.revenue_breakdown: Sales by Company-operated restaurants: $2,224.3 million, Revenues from franchised restaurants: $3,587.5 million, Other revenues: $86.0 million

risks_and_outlook.guidance: Accelerating the Arches strategy is working, as comparable sales grew 12.6% through a healthy balance of strategic menu price increases and positive traffic growth
risks_and_outlook.market_conditions: Challenging operating environment, customer demand for McDonald’s Brand remains strong
